loop.title: Loop
loop.description: Does the sound need to be looped automatically at the end of playing ?

autoPlay.title: Autoplay
autoPlay.description: Does the sound need to be played automatically at start ?

startTime.title: Start Time
startTime.description: The starting time of the sound in milliseconds, if it needs to start after a certain time

range.title: Range of the sound (only available with 3d sound)
range.description: The range of the sound in degrees, where sound can be played from it's position before it can't be heared anymore. From 1 to 360.
